Release 0.4.7
==================================

CLI
------------------

* Added ``-G, --vertical`` option to ``preview`` subcommand. It shows records in vertical style like MySQL's ``\G`` or PostgreSQL's ``\x`` (@yaggytter++).

General Changes
------------------

* Fixed a problem on Windows where classloader raises (@hito4_t++)

Release Date
------------------
2015-02-23
